akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1344. Status of Conrail after sale The Corporation shall be a rail carrier as defined in section 10102 of title 49, notwithstanding this subchapter. (Pub. L. 99–509, title IV, § 4036, Oct. 21, 1986, 100 Stat. 1909; Pub. L. 104–88, title III, § 332, Dec. 29, 1995, 109 Stat. 953.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1995—Pub. L. 104–88 substituted “section 10102” for “section 10102(19)”.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of 1995 AmendmentAmendment by Pub. L. 104–88 effective Jan. 1, 1996, see section 2 of Pub. L. 104–88, set out as an Effective Date note under section 1301 of Title 49, Transportation.
